about_the_game:
Isekai Idle

Reincarnated as an adventurer from another world, you face the threat of various monsters and even dragons around you. You make up your mind to assemble your own adventure team, defend the people around you, kill monsters to train yourself, and then... conquer all the difficulties in the world! Write your epic!

But! You are a powerful reincarnation from another world, possessing a divine skill panel. Therefore, you have decided to work hard, upgrade your skill level, recruit capable people, and fight against monsters with you to build a home together.

Game Features

In the game, you only need to lightly tap to continuously exercise your skills. No extra operations are required, just wait patiently to obtain the results of the exercise. They will be your battles upgraded to the highest level and become battle masters, or your passive skills upgraded to the highest level and become masters, or you will obtain legendary drops and make them into legendary god level props.

And all of this, all you need to do is click on a certain skill page, then lightly tap it, and with enough time, everything will become your harvest.

  • Diverse roles, battles, and lives

  • Different levels, types of combat areas, and types of enemies

  • Offline AFK revenue

  • Recruitable characters are continuously updated to help you fight and get more Rewards by recruiting more characters

  • Multiple combat modes continuously improve through continuous battles

  • The game system, which has rich content and is easy to learn, will provide more than ten (continuously updated) non combat skills for training, each with independent mechanisms and interactive effects between each other.

  • Continuously updated game content

  • Recruit game characters using base currency, refuse to recharge currency, and this game does not include any micro trading system. We firmly believe that games are a fair and pure land.

  • The game will add a multi platform cloud save function in the future, which requires network connection

  • At First Version, languages include Chinese, Japanese, Korean, English, and French. More languages are currently being developed and will be updated gradually in the future

  • Contact us with Discord on the right side
